comments.comment: Check out the new AUJS Revue 2006 site. Obviously the themes, settings, and pages are customised, but other than that, the code is pretty much Drupal Lite 1.0, through and through.

comments.name: psynaptic
comments.comment:
Thanks for sharing this with us. Shame there aren't more comments from people who have tried it out.

psy
